course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Advanced Topics in Loss Models and Financial Mathematics
course.description: In this course, the students are required to work on a specified topic related to financial mathematics. Project topic can be chosen from one of the following areas: (1) Numerical method in derivative pricing, (2) Advanced optimal portfolio selection theory, and (3) Loss model and its application in risk management. If time permitted, the students will also explore some statistical methods for model calibration. Students should seek instructor's approval to take this course.
course.prerequisites: MATH 2411 AND (MATH 4427 OR MATH 4512 OR MATH 4514)
